ai-patthana17.5:0.2_0: Having given the immaterial states produced by the phenomena that are counterpart of
ai-patthana17.5:0.3_0: Talking for oneself, looking for thoughts.
ai-patthana17.5:1.1_0: A skillful quality doesn’t give rise to placing the mind and keeping it connected. Mindfulness dependent on the body and speech.
ai-patthana17.5:1.1_4: (where) wholesome and unwholesome, there are three unwholesome thoughts,
ai-patthana17.5:2.1_0: (Only) a wholesome thought did not arise when it comes to the mind and keeping it connected. Mindfulness give rise to the cause or condition.
ai-patthana17.5:4.1_0: Not placing the mind and keeping it connected is without placing the mind, but without placing the mind and keeping it connected is a cause or reason. ...
